text:
I have every 2.x version to the last 2.0.48, I get the problem, but no problem 
with 1.x version.
When I modify a static element (page or picture), it becomes unavailable to the 
serverfor some second or minutes, it depends.
When a try to get that element directly by telnet to the server (AIX 4.3.3 ML 
11), it closes the connection brutally without giving me the page.
I have put apache in debug mode, I get that error in the error_log file :
[Fri Mar 05 13:08:31 2004] [info] (22)A system call received a parameter that 
is not valid.: core_output_filter: writing data to the network

when it becomes available again, no problem, everything gets OK again.

This is apparently an interaction between the kernel network buffer cache and
sendfile.

+1 for defaulting sendfile use to off ;)

Please re-open if disabling sendfile didn't resolve the problem.
